description: A law enforcement officer who patrols assigned areas to enforce laws and respond to calls
An investigator who works to solve crimes and conducts investigations
A first-line supervisor who oversees a squad of officers or detectives
A mid-level supervisor who oversees multiple sergeants and their squads
A commanding officer who oversees multiple lieutenants and their units
An executive who oversees multiple captains and their divisions
The highest-ranking officer who oversees the entire police department
